publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3800 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (Disclosure of Information to and by Lord Advocate and Scottish Ministers) (Scotland) Order 2003â€”That the Justice 2 Committee, in consideration of the draft Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (Disclosure of Information to and by Lord Advocate and Scottish Ministers) (Scotland) Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved.Supported by: Hugh Henry*
